clip.quote: I emailed my resume to about 10,000 agents... I got about 17 interviews.
clip.why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a unique and actionable approach to finding mentorship and breaking into a new market.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to break into luxury real estate? Here's a bold strategy that worked for Paul Salazar.

clip.quote: I create a 15-20 page offering memorandum for developers... they trust me even more.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights a detailed and effective method for attracting developer clients.
clip.suggested_hook: Looking to work with developers? Here's a strategy that sets you apart.
